attributes.review: First off I downloaded this app and it took FOREVER to download! Then when I clicked on it my phone started glitching and and I kept seeing this orange monster all over! attributes.review: Terrible isnâ€™t even the word to do it justice. This app is terribly formatted, and so difficult to navigate. It drains my battery power substantially every time I use it, AND whenever I forget to clear my apps the background battery waste is absolutely absurd. My phone worked and functioned just fine before this app, but I have a feeling downloading this caused my phone to glitch out and freeze due to the high usage of battery power. Unacceptable!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app literally made my whole family catch coronavirus and now my cat died because I went to the hospital to get treatment and when I came back Donald was holding him by the tail and dancing in a circle whilst my cat was trying to get away. After watching in horror for five minutes I realized that Donald was doing a ritual to summon the demon of orange. After ten minutes Donald burned my cat and then the demon of orange appeared and burned down my house. Would not recommend downloading this app.

attributes.title: Get rid of it

attributes.review:
I am not one to write reviews such as this... but I was just so infuriated with what this app has done to me. 

It all started with me downloading the app, of course, and it was EXTREMELY laggy to where every time I tapped the screen it would kick me out. After some time, however, I got it to work (though it was still lagging here and there). 

After I got the app to work, I was SO excited. I showed my entire family, posted on all of my social media, and even showed Tina, my goldfish! This is where things went downhill.

Right after I showed Tina a part of this terrible, terrible app, her skin and organs began to rot almost immediately until she was just bones. 

I am beyond devastated, but all I can do is write a review. 

#RIPTina
attributes.title: This app killed my goldfish!

Donâ€™t even waste your time or energy on this app!! ğŸ˜¡
